summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, Brooklyn Addition being the alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 101027 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
